alert.note: Alert for Bexar; Guadalupe; Wilson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 18 at 9:55AM CST by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Guadalupe, northwestern Wilson and southeastern Bexar Counties through 1045 AM CST... At 954 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Elmendorf, or 11 miles southeast of Stinson Municipal Airport, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... St. Hedwig, Elmendorf, La Vernia, New Berlin, Calaveras Lake, Sutherland Springs, Sandy Oaks, Parita, Losoya, Canada Verde, Sayers, Thelma, Adkins and Braunig Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
